name: YAABR
description:
Please leave feedback after playing

I will probably be dropping support for this project unless theres big game breaking bugs.

First standalone pc demo included for archive reasons.

This is a remaster/remake of the AB clone game i made back in 2019, now it has support for abilities, several types of enemies, potentially endless levels (without having to make a bunch of copies of the same menu, its fully dynamic), a fully functional (not very pleasing to the eye though) UI system, a working sound system and many other features.

Source code available below or at my github.
